topic.title: Daily Conversation Thread
topic.body: A Thread for talking about mundane stuff and how your day was.

topic.title: Zeronet propaganda
topic.body:
Doing some sort of propaganda/shilling for Zeronet would help adoption.
Any ideas for spreading It?

1589118404_1Ak954F5JD1uxGvAduUz9YwZFrVGe.body:
> [zaron](#comment_91_193HCur1fDFo7RoPUnQ1poMMexP4M9tbcU): Not be a sex addict?? You must not know too many Catholics

As in?

> [styromaniac](#comment_2152_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): He's talking about the pedo popes.

I don't think there ever was a pedo pope. Although I wouldn't doubt Francis could be the first.
As for the rest of the clergy, there are. But it's not as much as people think It is.
More likely to have a pedo teacher.
Clergy is to be chaste. Practicing Believers are usually either chaste, struggle for being chaste, or are married.
Clergy who commit such sin while using God's name are using his name in vain.

> [styromaniac](#comment_2153_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Yeah, I think it was Francis visiting satanic ritual events. You'll see him in the Pizzagate Documentary on KopyKate.

Pope Francis says heresy after heresy. I hope the bishops get him to leave.
With all respect.

1589536277_18fPUkt6NqUxRtpYgETn1fFmseYek.body: Oh wow, degeneracy in video! Exactly what we needed. After all, this is something rare that you can't find anywhere.

> [eroge](#comment_3_18fPUkt6NqUxRtpYgETn1fFmseYek1sJfF): This is only the beginning....in future i will post more rare material! :D

I don't even want to think about what that would be.

> [eroge](#comment_4_18fPUkt6NqUxRtpYgETn1fFmseYek1sJfF): if you don't like it don't share it. you can also ban me if you want; the difference from clearnet is that here your opinion have no value for who want to follow me. Here you decide, in clearnet you don't decide at all!

I don't remember trying to censor you. You have as much freedom to share porn as I do to say that it's bullshit and you shouldn't.
And it's not just a matter of me not sharing it. Pornography is dangerous in general and nobody should share or see it.
Not through censorship, but through understanding that pornography and masturbation are much like having cocaine on you all the time.
If I know this and keep quiet, shame on me for my omission. I'd be contributing to transforming people into brainlet coomers who do nothing but masturbate all day and can't do anything better with their lives.

> [styromaniac](#comment_2160_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Rape fetish... [...]

Is it? I didn't get to open it. Disgusting.
You don't commit a sin or crime just in act, you do it in your heart. If you look at rape with lust, you have committed rape in your own heart.

But I say unto you, That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart.

Matthew 5:28

> [styromaniac](#comment_2162_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Are you two always on the verge of an inflammatory religious argument? [...]

I'm cool.
You don't need the religious argument to notice that fornicators and people who masturbate end up with a bigger risk of becoming addicted coomers who can do nothing else all day.
Most of the arguments for it are just made up shit to feed the porn industry, which promotes fornication, adultery, addiction, rape and prostitution.

> [blurhy](#comment_495_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): It's you, neet. Masturbation is to relax and relieve your sexual desire

The body regulates tension on it's own, and sexual tension is a good thing that drives you forward to do better stuff.
Rather, people masturbate and waste the energy they could use on something better.

> [styromaniac](#comment_2161_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): I personally am cutting down on porn consumption, like quitting masturbating. I don't like the abnormality of my own sexual desire anymore than those of others, even though it's 100% legal.

Same. I wish I had never came into contact with this shit. At least I managed to understand how destructive it has been to my body and brain.
I usually can resist, but I have my times of weakness. I try to pray whenever I feel like doing so, and ask for forgiveness if I fail.
The fact that I have so much trouble shows how it's addicting as a drug.

> [blurhy](#comment_496_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Humanity is born to be good at having sex, as evolution theory suggests

Masturbation is negative for reproduction too. It's a waste of seed and it decreases sexual tension (leaving you not to want to reproduce).
You might have noticed animals don't really masturbate, other than a few monkey individuals and maybe some others.

> [blurhy](#comment_497_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Yeah, you can try not eating, which is also addicting

Well, it is. I also must hold off from eating, as I frequently eat more than I should (usually from anxiety).
These things are not good for you. Most people who do engage in such actions in exaggerations will regret it in some way, such as going overweight.
It's called gluttony, eating more than you need and should. The solution is fasting, not eating what you don't need.

> [blurhy](#comment_498_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): It does not waste anything, because new seed is generated everyday whether you have sex or not

You waste it as you throw it away instead of using it for procreation.
Sexual activity also reduces testosterone production. Doing so without procreating will increase your chances of not having babies and just jerking off in your basement all day, like many coomers do.

> [blurhy](#comment_499_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Be more ambitious and try holding your breath, which is more addicting. You retard are addicted to oxygen.

Addiction is different from necessity.
You need food to live, you don't need to be filling yourself up with bad food all day to live (and it will kill you).
But yes, breathing slowly is good.

> [blurhy](#comment_500_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Eating is not neccesary, as you said ? Breathing is ?

Read again.

> [blurhy](#comment_501_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): It does not matter, as I don't approve of masturbating too much either, which is REASONABLE

Good. Stay that way, I'd be sad if you got addicted to it. Then the problem is what we consider "too much".

> [blurhy](#comment_502_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): You can't

Can't what?

> [blurhy](#comment_503_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Defining how much is reasonable needs to someone

My general advice would be to, at least, take it to a minimum, when you can't hold it off, and without pornography.
My better advice would be not to do it, as it does not cultivates good emotions. Only lust, greed, gluttony, laziness, selfishness and addiction. Either be chaste or get married and be with your wife.

> [blurhy](#comment_504_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): It does produce these effects to YOU. Instead, it makes me feel relaxed and nothing negative

It's something general. You might not notice it, or you are, gladly, not exaggerating on your act.
But don't get into porn. Nothing good can come out of it. Your brain easily gets addicted. You won't be able to stop it easily, and you'll crave for more, and for weirder stuff.
Don't get me started on perversion. Stuff such as rape fetishes, adultery, pedophilia (which includes lolicon) and others aberrations.

> [blurhy](#comment_506_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Even if is, the reason is you guys propagating it as guility activity

If you refer to Catholicism, yes. We consider it to be harmful to yourself, a selfish act, and something that displeases God. It is a sin, and the way to deal with any sin is to notice it, repent and ask for forgiveness from  God, who forgives you and washes your sin. Then it's on you to forgive yourself and not sin again.
We don't have any shame of our gospel.

> [blurhy](#comment_507_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Porn does not mean to be these crazy things like you assume

Well, any sort of pornography implies adultery. You commit adultery in your heart as you lust after a woman who is not yours.

> [blurhy](#comment_508_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): How can I commit adultery with a hentai character

Being fictional does not stop your heart from having the same lustful sensations. The same way somebody who lusts after a lolicon character is, indeed, lusting after the image of a Child.

> [blurhy](#comment_510_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Wrong, it is imagination.

Yes, you are imagining a Child in a sexual way, and desiring that child in a sexual way. And you'd likely want to be with a child in that sexual way, and do sexual things to that child.
How is it not lusting after a child through the image of a child, then?
If you are consuming this kind of stuff, I advise you to stop and not go further.

> [blurhy](#comment_512_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Child porn is only a part of hentai. Why don't you argue on a wider sense ?

I already did. Looking at a woman on the streets with lust is a form of adultery, much more it is to watch porn.
Also, there are many more forms of perversion in anime stuff. The Japanese seem to have a thing for rape.

> [blurhy](#comment_513_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): You failed. All characters in hentai are fictional

What did you quote?
Also, it doesn't matter if it's fictional or not. What matters is what is in your heart, what drives you to see pornography, and what keeps you in there.

> [blurhy](#comment_514_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): It is not related

How so? Most hentai is twisted in some way. Even the most normal of them have some sort of rape reference, such as the way people talk (or moan).

> [blurhy](#comment_516_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Even if you were correct, few of them would commit rape. They relieve the desire by watching hentai.

Not really. All of this just makes the person more and more engulfed in their addiction and perversion, even thinking it might be acceptable to do so (because it's all just fictional).
Most people who do commit such things usually already used to watch a lot of pornography on the topic.
Most child rapists do watch (and make) a lot of child porn.

> [blurhy](#comment_515_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): So what. After watching hentai, the woman in your heart can be anyone, which is not 'guility' at all

I don't think I understood what you meant, can you be clearer, please?

> [blurhy](#comment_517_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Most child rapists do watch a lot of child porn. [...]

Why?

> [blurhy](#comment_518_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): Most child rapist watch child porn does not mean that most child porn wathchers are rapist

It does mean that it's an incentive, as they engulf themselves in that desire.
As a saying goes around here, **Quem treina, Joga** (He who practices, plays).

> [eroge](#comment_7_18fPUkt6NqUxRtpYgETn1fFmseYek1sJfF): My clips are 100% legal, filmed with celebs and taken from mainstream movies (very often not-porn ones).Maybe are taken from the same movie that you watched with your wife yesterday, anyway almost all my clips are well seeded now; because someone are interested! (but here you almost all are "against" my material, hypocrites!)

Watching a normal movie that might contain porn, and watching a porn movie for the sake of lust are different.
Intention matters.
I can assure you that I did not click on the link.

> [blurhy](#comment_520_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): So what, this can NOT be a reason why hentai is a cause of rape.As I said, people don't become rapists after watching hentai, and rapists are always rapists

Hentai itself is not. The desire that a person has, and that is not fulfilled, but strengthened by pornography, is a great factor.

> [blurhy](#comment_520_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): So what, this can NOT be a reason why hentai is a cause of rape.As I said, people don't become rapists after watching hentai, and rapists are always rapists

This is wrong. Not everybody who does evil has always been so.
We are behavioral beings, we behave to our environment. 
Environments that pushes people forward sexual perversion are likely to get them to be sexually perverted. And sexual perversion, plus other factors, lead to violence.
A person has the power to fight that off, but people are weak and cannot do it easily.
It's even worse when others say it's normal, and even good, to be perverted.

> [blurhy](#comment_521_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): You'd better learn about what caused child rapist to be so. I don't have the time to read your bullshit anymore.

Do as you please, brother. Just take care of yourself.

> [subutai](#comment_7_16FFktck2XiA33aQcarrqPA8XzK3coaUBD): Porn is easily accessible on the normal internet. I assume the true value of this ZeroNet is that you can express yourself in an uncensored way  without the worry of things being removed.  [...]

The issue with these networks are that, usually, people who get banned for posting shit and spamming tend to come to them, and they keep everybody with good things to share out, leaving just weird porn and spam.
I think this is the only that didn't become a mess. Gotta keep an eye out not to let it become a mess too.
When they wanted to make a reddit alternative, they made voat. It instantly got full of retarded shit, and nobody used it, and it got taken down. At that point, just use some IB.

\>and \\\> for non-green greentext

Wish my computer's power supply hadn't broken. It did a bit before after the quarantine got serious.
I might try to fix it some other day, for now I'm using the laptop that I used as a NAS.
Shit's serious here. Both the virus infection and death rate, and the extreme measures being taken by the local governments.
We're on number 4 here, 233 thousand cases. Managed to get worse than Spain and Italy.

> [adrenochrome](#comment_7_19dzDaMFcuCusp4anMUPkVc8zRzLJmxo9T): Zeronet should update posting features to be able to add picures or animations.

There's Geekless' Zerotalk++, but that's still under development. You can just link them, though.

1589714892_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: Something more important. Are you still alive?

1589945996_1A8k2FFyono2dUQWKaRzsRvbXguVu.body: I have tried advertising It on local imageboards, but most don't care and say it's paid shilling.
One basic thing is a way to sync and backup users.json with the press of a button. People won't really give a shit about zeronet while losing an account is so easy.

> [cexy](#comment_6_1Fjz1g7unEcMnTRy7nc9WUBZdA7eHkc7BL): @sabutai you are the samurai [...]

The correct way to quote people is @sabutai: .

> [cexy](#comment_6_1Fjz1g7unEcMnTRy7nc9WUBZdA7eHkc7BL):  I allow and approve of the following methods: deception* , lying, provocation, exploitation, use of false identity 

For what? For doing propaganda for Zeronet?

I do not aprove of lies and deceiving. We can easily spread this by showing features on the public, and with personal stories about it.
Maybe we can use @zeroseed: 's [public proxy](https://0net-preview.duckdns.org) as well, so people can test it before installing.
What would really help adoption would be to have a JS implementation that you could run on an extension, just like JS-IPFS (you install an extension, click JS implementation and you have IPFS). I think something like this is already being developed.
Making some images on gimp or something showing features would also help.
I think that the biggest selling point isn't even the no censorship part. Although many will come for this, I think that what will attract people more is how easy it is to create and share a website here.
Also, Zeronet should have an easy to toggle public blocklist on the homepage, and ask users about it on their first use. This will help prevent newbies from stumbling upon bad stuff.

The fact that these companies lie to us do not give rights for us to lie to other people who have nothing to do with it.
If we use dishonest advertising, we won't be "getting back at Intel", we will be participating on the mistreating of end users. Attacking Y because X attacked you is not self defense, self defense is attacking X because X attacked you.

Also, Zeronet is not as glitchy as people say it is. For me, it has been working fine mostly. Been using it daily, got my songs in here, I like it overall.
I fucked up my ZeroMe yesterday, but it was my own doing. I was messing with the files in the data directory to test something.
It just needs some modifications to be better. By far it's what works the best.
What zeronet, just like most free software projects, needs, is to people to actually get to know it exists.
I don't remember seeing advertisement for any of this stuff anywhere before, have you? At max niche places.

> [z0net](#comment_55_1KpsEG8BKkSJPFv8VVbngfC7xToMrYDJfS): There are a ton of disinfo agents on here spreading FUD about the platform. It's not perfect but more than functional for the purpose it was meant to serve. Thank goodness for the mute button.

Would make sense then, as that person is advising us to lie and deceive in order to spread this network, which would only reduce trust.

> [nzogth](#comment_9_1KCaZNP1gDSMcaCJ9o5yW8antSVefNuv7a): Driud expressed it best when he said that Zeronet is a network of redundancy, not one of anonymity. [...]

Yeah, people talk about zeronet like it's a tor replacement or some shit.

> [blurhy](#comment_539_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): We don't need propaganda if something is good enough

Even if it's great, if nobody spreads it, nobody will know it exists

> [blurhy](#comment_541_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): @aassddff Do you assume people are dumb ?

How are you going to know about something if it's completely hidden?
Why do you think companies invest millions in marketing? If it wasn't necessary, they wouldn't waste the money.

> [blurhy](#comment_544_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): You are completely hidden, but I'm sure you are RETARDED. [...]

Chill down. I feel like you're completely obsessed with religion and can't talk with me about anything else.

1589899830_18fPUkt6NqUxRtpYgETn1fFmseYek.body:
There are some things that are not meant to be archived, do no good in being archived, and should not be archived.
Not every information is good and worth protecting, and I recommend you look for help about this rape obsession of yours.

> [simulacra](#comment_2_16uy6uM8EwaNj2kDRLFSTqQNGauZ9D1qAZ): This is probably the dumbest shit I've read in a while - you can't trust anyone to draw the line on what should be archived and what shouldn't. The minute you do that you get the current state of the web.

One thing is you deciding not to archive, another thing is to have it censored. I have said that people should notice that there are stuff that should be left to be forgotten.
Of course there is a line. Morality is a thing. And if a person can't draw the line themselves and see they shouldn't share something, they should study philosophy on morality for a while.
Or do you think that we should also archive Child Porn as so to preserve information? I wouldn't think highly of a "Child Porn Archiver".
For instance, imagine that a picture or video of you in an intimate situation would leak. Do you think it would be correct for people to "archive" that for securing information?
If it was about archiving movie rape scenes, you could archive the whole movie or make a list of the movies which contain rape. Getting the rape scenes, which is what eroge said he was doing, just seems like an excuse to have realistic rape porn with the excuse of preserving information.

> [nekololi](#comment_462_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): where did eroge say such a thing? all i see is him archiving the games in their entirety.

In another topic.

1590009749_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKz.body: Literally just go to your data folder and "cp -r $siteaddress $destination".

1590192659_1KpsEG8BKkSJPFv8VVbngfC7xToMr.body:
> [bigbadbob](#comment_1080_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): We all have a mute button to use at our own discretion.  Do we really need to censor people by adding them to a block list?Free speech is a value we all share so perhaps we should reserve the block lists for illegal content as opposed to people who might have annoying opinions.  Shills and spammers can easily be blocked should they become annoying to the individual.

There's a difference between censorship and boycott/muting. Also, site owners should surely censor some sorts of stuff. Mainly pedo shit, other perversions and crime; but I'm all in for shutting the CIA glowies down too.
Freedom means freedom to get what you dislike out of your own house too.
Zeronet's purpose is to have censorship resistant websites, as in, not having some government agency shutting you down, and not getting you dependent on the service of companies that can shut down the service in boycott. 
It's not about having comments inside people's own websites to be not censored.
By the way, Styro, any way I can turn some of the blocks off in Moab?

1592157079_1LZUsLPdv5RUx1VVGP81RyKwiHTfS.body:
> [ltl](#comment_1_1Hwnbt8dDk2r2CB8R4tbGTcM4pY4Tp4VMU): I do not agree with you. For example, many christians and jewish orthodox hate members of other religious groups without even knowing them. Some people hates gays even if they do not know any personally. And there are plenty of other examples when hate comes without loving first.

Christian love bears evil, but it does not tolerate it.
It does penance for the sins of others, but it is not broadminded about sin.
The cry for tolerance never induces it to quench its hatred of the evil philosophies that have entered into contest with the Truth.
It forgives the sinner, and it hates the sin; it is unmerciful to the error in his mind.
The sinner it will always take back into the bosom of the Mystical Body;
but his lie will never be taken into the treasury of His Wisdom.
Real love involves real hatred:
whoever has lost the power of moral indignation and the urge to drive the buyers and sellers from the temples
has also lost a living, fervent love of Truth.
Charity, then, is not a mild philosophy of "live and let live";
it is not a species of sloppy sentiment.
Charity is the infusion of the Spirit of God,
which makes us love the beautiful and hate the morally ugly.

-Archbishop Fulton Sheen
